<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/tfaappwithlink"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the confirmation email URL for updating TFA settings.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["None","Sms","App"],"type":"string","description":"[None - None, Sms - Sms, App - App]","example":"None"},{"enum":[0,1,2],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - None, 1 - Sms, 2 - App]","example":0,"x-enum-varnames":["None","Sms","App"],"x-enum-descriptions":["None","Sms","App"]}],"description":"The two-factor authentication type.","title":"TfaRequestsDtoType"},"id":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the user for whom the TFA settings are being configured.","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"},"trustedIps":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"The list of IP addresses that bypass TFA verification.","nullable":true,"example":["some text"]},"mandatoryUsers":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The list of user IDs for whom TFA is mandatory.","nullable":true,"example":["75a5f745-f697-4418-b38d-0fe0d277e258"]},"mandatoryGroups":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The list group IDs whose members must use TFA.","nullable":true,"example":["75a5f745-f697-4418-b38d-0fe0d277e258"]}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for configuring the Two-Factor Authentication (TFA) settings.","title":"TfaRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
